content: कुसुंभः, --भं [<ls>Uṇ. 4. 106</ls>] {@--1@} Safflower; कुसुंभारुणं चारु चेलं वसाना <ls>Jag.</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Saffron. {@--3@} The waterpot of an ascetic. --भं Gold. --भः Mere outward affection (compared with the colour of safflower).
